about-me.title: About me
about-me.text: My name is Federico Vera. I am a graduate electronics technician with self-taught programming skills and a commitment to continuous learning. I always strive to give my best, whether in work, study, or sports. I excel in quickly adapting to any team environment.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: I currently work as an independent professional, offering specialized services since I ended my employment relationship with my last employer. During this period, I have had the opportunity to collaborate on various projects that have enriched my skills and expanded my experience in the Programming area.
